column1: Little Goat Diner////After a few visits to the Little Goat we found the food to be great. Although
column2: I do caution to be aware of what you order. The Goat Burger is one of the best burgers in the city. The Fish Tostadas are to die for. Their fries are great. There were a few items that we did not like
column3: but overall the food was amazing.
